title: Everything everywhere all at once: How Zohran Mamdani campaigned both online and with a ground game
description: How much did Zohran Mamdani’s old-fashioned ground game contribute to his victory in the New York mayor’s race?
content:
New York mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani and U.S. Rep. Pramila Jayapal meet voters to go door-knocking in Jackson Heights on Sept. 14, 2025. Selcuk Acar/Anadolu via Getty Images
